briefTitle: Phase III Study Comparing the Efficacy and Safety of EP2006 and Filgrastim
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blind, Parallel-group, Multi-center Phase III Study Comparing the Efficacy and Safety of EP2006 and NeupogenÂ® in Breast Cancer Patients Treated With Myelosuppressive Chemotherapy
summary: The study will assess the efficacy of EP2006 compared to Filgrastim with respect to the mean duration of severe neutropenia during treatment with myelosuppressive chemotherapy in breast cancer patients.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Duration of Grade 4 Neutropenia During Cycle 1 of Chemotherapy
